originContent: # Publish VS Code Extension — GitHub Action
translatedContent: # 发布 VS Code 扩展 — GitHub Action

[![构建、代码检查、测试和部署](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/HaaLeo/publish-vscode-extension/CI.yml?style=flat-square&label=Lint%2C%20Build%2C%20Test%20and%20Deploy)](https://github.com/HaaLeo/publish-vscode-extension/actions?query=workflow%3A%22Build%2C+Lint%2C+Test+and+Deploy%22) [![覆盖率状态](https://img.shields.io/coveralls/github/HaaLeo/publish-vscode-extension?style=flat-square)](https://coveralls.io/github/HaaLeo/publish-vscode-extension)

originContent: GitHub action to publish your VS Code Extension to the [Open VSX Registry](https://open-vsx.org/) or the [Visual Studio Marketplace](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com).
translatedContent: GitHub Action 用于将您的 VS Code 扩展发布到 [Open VSX Registry](https://open-vsx.org/) 或 [Visual Studio Marketplace](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com)。

originContent: > All breaking changes of **v2** are listed in the [changelog](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HaaLeo/publish-vscode-extension/master/CHANGELOG.md#changelog)
translatedContent: > **v2** 版本的所有重大变更列在 [更新日志](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HaaLeo/publish-vscode-extension/master/CHANGELOG.md#changelog) 中

originContent: To use the GitHub Action, just [reference the action](https://help.github.com/en/actions/configuring-and-managing-workflows/configuring-a-workflow#referencing-actions-in-your-workflow) in your workflow file.
translatedContent: 要使用该 GitHub Action，只需在您的工作流文件中[引用该 Action](https://help.github.com/en/actions/configuring-and-managing-workflows/configuring-a-workflow#referencing-actions-in-your-workflow)。

originContent: The following example shows a workflow that publishes an extension to the Open VSX Registry as well as to the Visual Studio Marketplace when a new tag was created:
translatedContent: 下面的示例展示了一个工作流，当创建新标签时，将扩展发布到 Open VSX Registry 以及 Visual Studio Marketplace：

originContent: - name: Publish to Open VSX Registry
translatedContent: - name: Publish to Open VSX Registry

originContent: - name: Publish to Visual Studio Marketplace
translatedContent: - name: Publish to Visual Studio Marketplace
要只打包扩展一次并将**相同的** `.vsix` 文件发布到两个注册表，可以改用以下两个步骤：

originContent: To package the extension only once and publish the **identical** `.vsix` file to both registries one can use the following two steps instead:
- name: Publish to Open VSX Registry
translatedContent: - name: Publish to Open VSX Registry

originContent: - name: Publish to Visual Studio Marketplace
translatedContent: - name: Publish to Visual Studio Marketplace

originContent: For a more complete and complex example one can check out the workflow of [`HaaLeo/vscode-timing`](https://github.com/HaaLeo/vscode-timing/blob/master/.github/workflows/cicd.yml#L1).
translatedContent: 有关更完整和复杂的示例，可以查看 [`HaaLeo/vscode-timing`](https://github.com/HaaLeo/vscode-timing/blob/master/.github/workflows/cicd.yml#L1) 的工作流程。

originContent: To publish to the Open VSX Registry ensure that your [extension's namespace](https://github.com/eclipse/openvsx/wiki/Publishing-Extensions#2-create-the-namespace) was created **beforehand**.
translatedContent: 要发布到 Open VSX 注册表，请确保您的 [扩展命名空间](https://github.com/eclipse/openvsx/wiki/Publishing-Extensions#2-create-the-namespace) **已提前**创建。

originContent: You need to set the `pat` parameter to your [Open VSX access token](https://github.com/eclipse/openvsx/wiki/Publishing-Extensions#1-create-an-access-token).
translatedContent: 您需要将 `pat` 参数设置为您的 [Open VSX 访问令牌](https://github.com/eclipse/openvsx/wiki/Publishing-Extensions#1-create-an-access-token)。

originContent: Further, you should ensure that you only publish an extension which is licensed.
translatedContent: 此外，您应确保只发布有许可证的扩展。

originContent: For more information regarding Open VSX' timeline and its extensions' licensing check out [Brian King's blog](https://blogs.eclipse.org/post/brian-king/open-vsx-registry-under-new-management) (section "Licensing" and "Timeline").
translatedContent: 有关 Open VSX 时间线及其扩展许可的更多信息，请查看 [Brian King 的博客](https://blogs.eclipse.org/post/brian-king/open-vsx-registry-under-new-management)（章节“Licensing”和“Timeline”）。

originContent: Currently, this GitHub action allows you to publish extensions which do not state their license terms.
translatedContent: 目前，此 GitHub 操作允许您发布未声明许可条款的扩展。

originContent: However, this behavior is deprecated and a future release of this action will reject unlicensed extensions.
translatedContent: 然而，此行为已被弃用，未来版本的此操作将拒绝无许可扩展。

originContent: Therefore, I heavily encourage you to publish an extension with a (permissive) license such as the [MIT license](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit/).
translatedContent: 因此，我强烈建议您使用（宽松的）许可证发布扩展，例如 [MIT 许可证](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit/)。

originContent: In order to upload your extension to the VS Marketplace you need to set the `pat` option to the corresponding [access token](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/working-with-extensions/publishing-extension#get-a-personal-access-token).
translatedContent: 为了将您的扩展上传到 VS 市场，您需要将 `pat` 选项设置为相应的 [访问令牌](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/working-with-extensions/publishing-extension#get-a-personal-access-token)。

originContent: Further, the `registryUrl` must be set to `https://marketplace.visualstudio.com`.

translatedContent: 您可以设置以下任意或所有输入参数：

originContent: You can set any or all of the following input parameters:

translatedContent: |`pat` |string  |是 |-|对应注册表的个人访问令牌。

originContent: |`pat` |string  |yes |-|The personal access token to the corresponding registry.
translatedContent: |`extensionFile` |string  |否 | - |要发布的 vsix 文件路径。与 `packagePath` 一起设置时此选项优先。

originContent: |`extensionFile` |string  |no | - |Path to the vsix file to be published. This option will be preferred when set together with `packagePath`.
translatedContent: |`registryUrl` |string  |否 |`https://open-vsx.org` |使用此基础 URL 的注册表 API

originContent: |`registryUrl` |string  |no |`https://open-vsx.org` |Use the registry API at this base URL
translatedContent: |`packagePath` |string |否 | `./` |要打包和发布的扩展路径。当同时设置了 `extensionFile` 时，忽略 `packagePath`。

originContent: |`packagePath` |string |no | `./` |Path to the extension to be packaged and published. When `extensionFile` is set too `packagePath` is ignored.
translatedContent: |`baseContentUrl` |string |否 | - |为 README.md 中的所有相对链接添加此 URL 前缀。

originContent: |`baseContentUrl` |string |no | - | Prepend all relative links in README.md with this URL.
translatedContent: |`baseImagesUrl` |string |否 | - |为 README.md 中的所有相对图片链接添加此 URL 前缀。

originContent: |`baseImagesUrl` |string |no | - | Prepend all relative image links in README.md with this URL.
translatedContent: |`yarn` |boolean |否 | `false` |打包扩展文件时使用 yarn 替代 npm。

originContent: |`yarn` |boolean |no | `false` | Use yarn instead of npm while packing extension files.
translatedContent: |`dryRun` |boolean |否 | `false` |将此选项设置为 `true` 以打包扩展但不发布。使用此选项时，`pat` 需设置为占位值。

originContent: |`dryRun` |boolean |no | `false` | Set this option to `true` to package your extension but do not publish it. When using this option set the `pat` option to a stub value.
translatedContent: |`noVerify` |boolean| 否 |`false` |允许发布使用提议 API（enableProposedApi: true）的扩展到 Visual Studio 市场。类似 vsce 的 `--noVerify` 命令行参数。

originContent: |`noVerify` |boolean| no |`false` | Allow publishing extensions to the visual studio marketplace which use a proposed API (enableProposedApi: true). Similar to vsce's `--noVerify` command line argument.
translatedContent: |`preRelease` |boolean| 否 |`false` |将扩展发布标记为预发布。仅在打包扩展时考虑。

originContent: |`preRelease` |boolean| no |`false` | Mark the extensions release as pre-release. Is only considered when packaging an extension.
translatedContent: |`dependencies` |boolean| 否 |`true` |检查 `package.json` 中定义的依赖是否存在于 `node_modules`。使用 pnpm 或 yarn v2+ 的 PnP 时设置为 `false`。

originContent: |`dependencies` |boolean| no |`true` | Check that dependencies defined in `package.json` exist in `node_modules`. Set to `false` if using pnpm or yarn v2+ with PnP.
translatedContent: |`skipDuplicate` |boolean| 否 |`false` |如果市场上已存在相同版本，则静默失败。等同于 vsce CLI 的 `--skip-duplicate` 选项。

originContent: |`skipDuplicate` |boolean| no |`false` | Fail silently if version already exists on the marketplace. Equivalent to the `--skip-duplicate` option of the vsce CLI.
translatedContent: |`target` |string| 否 | - |扩展应运行的目标架构。多个目标用空格分隔。例如：`'win32-x64 linux-x64'`

originContent: |`target` |string| no | - | Target architecture(s) the extension should run on. Separate multiple targets with spaces. E.g.: `'win32-x64 linux-x64'`
The action exposes the following outputs:
|`vsixPath` |string |The path to the packaged and published VSIX file.
translatedContent: |`vsixPath` |string |已打包并发布的 VSIX 文件路径。

originContent: If you found a bug or are missing a feature do not hesitate to [file an issue](https://github.com/HaaLeo/publish-vscode-extension/issues/new/choose).
translatedContent: 如果您发现了错误或缺少功能，请不要犹豫，[提交问题](https://github.com/HaaLeo/publish-vscode-extension/issues/new/choose)。

originContent: To get started submitting code changes please take a look at the [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HaaLeo/publish-vscode-extension/master/./CONTRIBUTING.md) file first.
translatedContent: 要开始提交代码更改，请先查看 [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HaaLeo/publish-vscode-extension/master/./CONTRIBUTING.md) 文件。

originContent: When you like this extension make sure to [star the repo](https://github.com/HaaLeo/publish-vscode-extension/stargazers). I am always looking for new ideas and feedback.
translatedContent: 如果您喜欢此扩展，请务必[给仓库加星](https://github.com/HaaLeo/publish-vscode-extension/stargazers)。我一直在寻找新的想法和反馈。

originContent: In addition, it is possible to [donate via paypal](https://www.paypal.me/LeoHanisch/3eur).
